item.title: Report X-2023091021
item.description:
Report X-2023091021

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHEN PACKAGE ARRIVED IN THE QA I DICOVERED IT WAS SOILED I OBSERVED THE INSIDE DISCOVERING IT HAD A LOOSE CAP CAUSEING THE LIQUID TO LEAK I TRANSFERED BOTTLES INTO A HAZMAT DRUM DescribePack: BOTTOM OF THE HAZMAT PACKAGE WAS SOILED DUE TO ONE OF THE FOUR BOTTLES HAVING A LOOSE CAP DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: TIGHTENED THE CAP AND TRASFERED IT TO A HAZMAT DRUM

item.title: Report X-2023090955
item.description:
Report X-2023090955

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-18
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME TO QA LEAKING. UPON CLOSER INSPECTION FOUND THAT THE PLASTIC BOTTLE HAD LOOSE CAPS AND NO INNER PACKING. ALL EXCESS LIQUID ABSORBED BY THE BOX. BOX DRUMMED AND SENT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN TOTE AND SENT TO QA

item.title: Report X-2023090942
item.description:
Report X-2023090942

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-18
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, and brought to QA. DescribePack: Cap was not unscrewed, however it had totally popped out of the container. No inner packing. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.
